import React from 'react' import './CurrentMusic.css' import aone from '../StaticMusic/1.mp3' import atwo from '../StaticMusic/2.mp3' import athree from '../StaticMusic/3.mp3' import afour from '../StaticMusic/4.mp3' import afive from '../StaticMusic/5.mp3' let index = localStorage.getItem('index') const allAudios = [aone, atwo, athree, afour, afive]; const source = allAudios[index - 1] const song = new Audio(source) class CurrentMusic extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { paused: true } } render(){ return (
